OOC: I had already put lasers, but you might have
missed it.

BIC: Cutie lands on his butt, and gets sued for
copyright infringment (does a roundhouse kick himself
and this bots legs to try to get him on the ground),
and jumps back up aiming his rifle.

Cutie: WHO THE PIT ARE YOU! GRANTED I'M AN EXCEENTRIC
OLD BOT, MAYBE EVEN A LITTLE CRAZY, BUT NOT TO THE
POINT WHERE I NEED TO BE PUT OUT OF MY MISERY! NOW
GIVE ME A NAME BOY AND YOU MAY VERY WELL BE
FUNCTIONING WHEN THE SUN COMES UP!
